name: Solo Blaster
description:
Controls:

- Shoot: X

- Start game: Z

- Rotate Clockwise: Right arrow -->

- Rotate Counter-Clockwise: Left arrow <--

Hey everyone. This is my first official game made using Pico-8. It was a lot of fun and I had a great time making a well-polished and enjoyable time waster. I know the controls are a little tricky, but I had to work with what Pico-8 gave me haha. Let me know what your thoughts are, and see if you can beat my current high-score of 417!

Have fun.
